name: @seimoney/mcp-agents
description: AI-powered agents with MCP integration for SeiMoney DeFi platform

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter risk-agent dev" "pnpm --filter scheduler-agent dev" "pnpm --filter rebalancer-agent dev" "pnpm --filter mcp-server dev"
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter risk-agent build && pnpm --filter scheduler-agent build && pnpm --filter rebalancer-agent build && pnpm --filter mcp-server build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter risk-agent start" "pnpm --filter scheduler-agent start" "pnpm --filter rebalancer-agent start" "pnpm --filter mcp-server start"
scripts.test:all: pnpm --filter risk-agent test && pnpm --filter scheduler-agent test && pnpm --filter rebalancer-agent test && pnpm --filter mcp-server test
